Projects.Name: Gesture Recognition for Human-Computer Interaction
Description: Engineered a solution for real-time sign language detection using computer vision and deep learning

This project employs Media-Pipe for real-time holistic landmark detection using webcam input. It captures video, processes it through the holistic model, and exports key point data. The exported data trains an LSTM neural network to recognize predefined actions.
The trained model predicts actions in real-time.
Developed and implemented a system with 90.5 percentage accuracy in hand gesture recognition.

Projects.Name: Wanderlust
Description: Developed a full-stack web application on which users can book and rent hotels, holiday homes, and other accommodations. Property providers have the opportunity to list their properties on the website as well.
Created the front-end using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap for a responsive and Eye-catching design.
Established a robust back-end infrastructure with MongoDB, Node.js, and Express.js, enabling efficient data management and seamless API integration.

Projects.Name: Money Map
Description: An all-in-one platform for students’ money tracking, financial education, investor connections, and scholarships.

Features - Expense and income tracking for insights on spending and cash flow. Scholarship finder to suggest the best scholarships based on user background. Investors connect to match startup ideas with potential investors. Financial goal setting for effective money management.
